<<header |=Installing Ocsigen>>

To install Ocsigen, just download the packages you want using [[https://opam.ocaml.org/|opam]],
the OCaml package manager.

[[wiki("ocsigen-start"):|Ocsigen-start]] is a good place to start:
{{{
$ opam install ocsigen-start
}}}

Then, create your application using {{{eliom-distillery}}}:
{{{
$ eliom-distillery -name myapp -template os.pgocaml
}}}

A tutorial is available [[wiki("tuto"):|here]].

=== Non-OCaml dependencies

You may need to install some external (i.e. non-OCaml) dependencies first. You can use [[https://opam.ocaml.org/packages/opam-depext/|ocaml-depext]] to install those packages on your operating system:

{{{
$ opam install ocaml-depext
$ opam depext ocsigen-start
}}}

You may also need to install either {{{sass}}} or {{{sassc}}} from your system
package manager. On Debian-based systems:
{{{
$ apt-get install ruby-sass
}}}
